desc: african craftwork is a fair trade co. representing a small talented workshop of Zimbabweans who have turned to art and music as a means of self expression and subsistence. Selling mbira, electric mbira, kalimba, electric kalimba, thumb piano, Shona stone sculpture, elephant hair bracelets Zulu knob kerrie walking stick

layout.text: 37 KEY NJARI ELECTRIC MBIRA - SINGLE PICKUP.
Unique to African Craftwork - now on sale! $175
